## **Convert data using `massconverter`**

---

`massconverter` is a pacakge in `tidymass` which can be used to convert mass spectrometry raw data based on docker image of pwid. See more information [here](https://tidymass.github.io/massconverter/).

#### Convert data to `mzXML` format data

We use the demo data to show how to use `massconverter`.

Download the data and put them your working directory and uncompress it.
